onboardingSubtitle1: Explore a world of endless possibilities. Store-ify is your one-stop destination for a diverse range of stores and products.
onboardingSubtitle2: Browse through a variety of stores and products. Find the latest trends, exclusive deals, and more. Your next great find is just a tap away
onboardingSubtitle3: Enjoy a seamless shopping experience. Shop from multiple stores in one place, use our search options to find what you need, and discover a new way to shop.
locationDenied: Location permission denied. Please grant it.
howDoUWantToPay: How do you want to Pay ?
cardNumberDigitsOnly: Card number must contain only digits
passwordInvalidLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
passwordContainsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordContainsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordContainsDigit: Password must contain at least one digit
passwordContainsSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
nameInvalidLength: Name must be more than 3 characters
cardHolderNumberDigitsOnly: Card holder number must contain only digits
sureToLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
enableLocationPermission: Grant permission for Store-ify to access the geographic location of this device?
